archimate:Node.name: IBM - GTS
archimate:Node.documentation: 'GTS (global technology services) : Infrastructure and managed services (administartion of security, backups, disaster recovery, hosting , security patching, health checks, DRP tests) and governance (Copil, technical comitte) : - LOT 1: France (ERP Mainframe, VM citrix, Linux) - LOT 2: UK and Poland (ERP M3) - LOT 3: UK (Legacy IT systems : xSeries, former local datacenter)
